jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
Tripyr is a startup in the connected, intelligent, autonomous vehicle field. 

We have a unique invention & business model that has the opportunity to radically disrupt 2 major world industries worth $trillions. This business could be as big as Uber/Airbnb.

Right now, we’re building a small team of directors, who will be rewarded with equity from Tripyr Holdings Limited, for their contribution.

The position is for CTO, with the initial focus on Systems Architecture.

If you think you’re qualified for this, please email me on Ian@tripyr.com so I can send you an NDA (the invention is still a bit of a secret)

After you read about the concept, and you still feel qualified, we would ask you to prepare a short report on what you can bring to the project.

If you are selected, we can talk about equity terms and expectations.

Once agreed, we complete all the legal stuff to ensure both you and the company are protected.

Tripyr Holdings will move forward to a series of successful funding rounds while developing the business and eventually sell out, converting your equity into cash.

Tripyr is a startup in the connected, intelligent, autonomous vehicle field.

If you think you’re qualified for this, please email me on Ian@tripyr.com so I can send you an NDA (the invention is still a bit of a secret)

After you read about the concept, and you still feel qualified, we would ask you to prepare a short report on what you can bring to the project.
